title: Crashes And Trashes : Pack 1
description: Crashes, Breaks, Impacts, Shatterings, Scrapings..All In One Foley Pack
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

DEMO 1



HIGHLIGHTS OF THIS PACK: 

***********************

(1) Available at an outstandingly affordable price—significantly lower than the combined cost of the

"NEW ADDED SOUNDS + PRE-RELEASED PACKS "

This comprehensive collection not only debuts new sound categories but also includes all the sounds from our three acclaimed releases: ‘Broken Glasses Pack 1’, ‘Impacts: Concrete and Rocks’, and ‘Rocks in Motion’.


(2) Include Materials:-

**************************

Metal

Glass

Rocks/Concrete

Wood 

Blends


About:-

************

“Crashing, smashing, shattering, and scraping of various objects, such as cars, slabs, wooden objects, rocks, debris, etc are common occurrences in RPG video games, particularly in action, adventure, and fighting genres. This pack offers a comprehensive collection of such foley sounds, including crashes, impacts, shatterings, and scrapings of various materials like metal, glass, rocks, and wood. Many of the sounds are a blend of different materials. For instance, when a car crashes, it’s not just the sound of breaking glass but also the metallic crunch that is produced simultaneously. With these realistic situations in mind, we created this pack.”
